statements: SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT customer_id, status FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT support_agent_id, created_at FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT issue_description, status FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE support_agent_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT MIN(created_at) FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY status;
SELECT support_agent_id, AVG(customer_id) FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY support_agent_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(created_at) FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(created_at) FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 10 AND status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status IN ('Open', 'Pending');
SELECT customer_id, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT support_agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_assigned FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY support_agent_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = (SELECT MAX(customer_id) FROM customer_support_tickets);
SELECT customer_id, status, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id, status;
SELECT customer_id, status, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status <> 'Closed' GROUP BY customer_id, status;
SELECT customer_id, support_agent_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), created_at)) AS average_pending_days FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Pending' GROUP BY customer_id, support_agent_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status != 'Resolved' AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), created_at)) AS average_response_time FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT support_agent_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), created_at)) AS average_response_time FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY support_agent_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), created_at)) AS longest_pending_days FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Pending' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), created_at)) AS shortest_pending_days FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Pending' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(created_at, COALESCE(TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00', created_at))) AS average_response_time_from_start FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, support_agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_assigned FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open' GROUP BY customer_id, support_agent_id;
SELECT customer_id, support_agent_id, MAX(created_at) AS last_ticket_date FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id, support_agent_id;
SELECT customer_id, support_agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_from_agent FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE support_agent_id = 3 GROUP BY customer_id, support_agent_id;
SELECT customer_id, support_agent_id, MIN(created_at) AS first_ticket_date FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id, support_agent_id;
SELECT customer_id, status, MAX(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), created_at)) AS longest_pending_days FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Pending' GROUP BY customer_id, status;
SELECT * FROM customersupport_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM customersupport_tickets;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority > 2;
SELECT * FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE support_agent = 'Alice';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority = 1;
SELECT customer_name, support_agent FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority < 3;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, support_agent FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority = 3;
SELECT * FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE support_agent = 'Bob' AND priority > 1;
SELECT * FROM issue_resolution;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_description FROM issue_resolution;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_description, resolved_at FROM issue_resolution WHERE resolved_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM issue_resolution WHERE resolution_description LIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT ticket_id, resolved_at FROM issue_resolution WHERE ticket_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM issue_resolution WHERE resolution_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_description FROM issue_resolution WHERE resolution_description LIKE '%solved%' AND resolved_at <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_description, resolved_at FROM issue_resolution WHERE ticket_id IN (SELECT ticket_id FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority > 2);
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_description, resolved_at FROM issue_resolution WHERE ticket_id IN (SELECT ticket_id FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE support_agent = 'Alice');
SELECT * FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id;

SELECT customer_name, issue_description, support_agent, priority, resolution_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority > 2;
SELECT customer_name, support_agent FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT customer_name, support_agent, issue_description FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority = 5;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, priority FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority < 4 AND priority > 1;
SELECT customer_name, support_agent, issue_description FROM customersupport_tickets ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT AVG(priority) AS avg_priority FROM customersupport_tickets;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM customersupport_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description, support_agent FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id;

SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id ORDER BY resolved_at DESC;

SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id WHERE resolved_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets LEFT JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets RIGHT JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets FULL JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id;

SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id AND issue_resolution.resolution_description LIKE '%solved%';

SELECT customer_name, issue_description, resolved_at FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id AND issue_resolution.resolved_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_resolutions FROM customersupport_tickets INNER JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(priority) AS avg_priority FROM customersupport_tickets GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_resolutions FROM customersupport_tickets LEFT JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_resolutions FROM customersupport_tickets RIGHT JOIN issue_resolution ON customersupport_tickets.ticket_id = issue_resolution.ticket_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT * FROM ticket_comments;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT ticket_id, open_date, close_date FROM tickets;
SELECT comment, posted_by, posted_date FROM ticket_comments;
SELECT customer_name, email, open_date, close_date FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id;
SELECT ticket_id, status, comment FROM tickets JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id;
SELECT customer_name, status, comment, posted_by FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM ticket_comments WHERE posted_by = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Bob';
SELECT ticket_id, close_date FROM tickets WHERE open_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT comment, posted_date FROM ticket_comments WHERE posted_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, open_date FROM tickets ORDER BY open_date DESC;
SELECT comment, posted_by FROM ticket_comments ORDER BY posted_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tickets LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, open_date, close_date FROM tickets WHERE open_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, open_date FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id;
SELECT ticket_id, comment FROM ticket_comments;
SELECT ticket_id, comment FROM ticket_comments WHERE posted_by = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, comment FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id;

SELECT customer_name, comment FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id WHERE posted_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(close_date) AS last_closed_ticket FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id WHERE status = 'Closed' GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(timestampdiff(HOUR, open_date, close_date)) AS avg_ticket_duration FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id WHERE status = 'Closed' GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_name, comment, posted_date FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id WHERE comment LIKE '%urgent%' AND status = 'Open';

SELECT customer_name, email, open_date, comment, posted_by FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id WHERE ticket_comments.comment LIKE '%resolved%' AND status = 'Closed';

SELECT customer_name, email, open_date, comment, posted_by FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_comments ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id WHERE ticket_comments.posted_by IN ('Alice', 'Bob');
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_id, status FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT support_rep_id, support_rep_name FROM support_reps;
SELECT resolution_id, ticket_id, resolution_date FROM resolutions;
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_details FROM resolutions;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY status, ticket_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as ticket_count FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, COUNT(*) as ticket_count FROM tickets INNER JOIN customers ON tickets.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT support_rep_name, COUNT(*) as resolved_tickets FROM resolutions INNER JOIN support_reps ON resolutions.ticket_id = support_reps.support_rep_id GROUP BY support_rep_name;
SELECT customer_name, status, issue_description FROM tickets INNER JOIN customers ON tickets.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT sr.support_rep_name, COUNT(*) as unresolved_tickets FROM tickets LEFT JOIN support_reps sr ON tickets.support_rep_id = sr.support_rep_id WHERE status = 'Open';

SELECT sr.support_rep_name, COUNT(*) as resolved_tickets FROM resolutions INNER JOIN support_reps sr ON resolutions.ticket_id = sr.support_rep_id WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY sr.support_rep_name;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE support_rep_id = 1;
SELECT support_rep_name, support_rep_email FROM support_reps;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, issue_description FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id;

SELECT ticket_id, support_rep_name, resolution_details FROM tickets JOIN support_reps ON tickets.support_rep_id = support_reps.support_rep_id JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE support_rep_id IN (SELECT support_rep_id FROM support_reps WHERE support_rep_name = 'Alice');
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM customers INNER JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id WHERE tickets.status = 'Resolved';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, resolution_details FROM tickets JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(ticket_id) FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT support_rep_name, MAX(resolution_date) FROM support_reps JOIN tickets ON support_reps.support_rep_id = tickets.support_rep_id JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id GROUP BY support_rep_name;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 5;
SELECT support_rep_name, AVG(ticket_id) FROM support_reps JOIN tickets on support_reps.support_rep_id = tickets.support_rep_id GROUP BY support_rep_name;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(resolution_id) AS total_resolutions FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, ticket_id FROM tickets UNION ALL SELECT customer_id, resolution_id FROM resolutions;
SELECT customer_id, total_tickets FROM (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id) AS subquery WHERE total_tickets > 3;

SELECT customer_name, resolution_date FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id WHERE resolution_date = (SELECT MAX(resolution_date) FROM resolutions WHERE ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id);
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id WHERE tickets.status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers;
SELECT agent_id, name, email, department FROM agents;
SELECT department_id, name FROM departments;
SELECT * FROM ticket_responses;
SELECT ticket_id, agent_id, response_text FROM ticket_responses;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.issue_description, a.name AS agent_name FROM tickets t JOIN agents a ON t.customer_id = a.agent_id;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, t.created_at, tr.response_text FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN ticket_responses tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id;
SELECT t.issue_description, t.status, tr.response_text, tr.response_time FROM tickets t LEFT JOIN ticket_responses tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id;
SELECT a.name AS agent_name, d.name AS department_name FROM agents a JOIN departments d ON a.department = d.department_id;
SELECT t.issue_description, tr.response_text FROM tickets t JOIN ticket_responses tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id WHERE t.status = 'Open';
SELECT c.name, COUNT(t.ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT d.name AS department_name, COUNT(a.agent_id) AS total_agents FROM departments d JOIN agents a ON d.department_id = a.department GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT t.issue_description, t.status, tr.response_text, tr.response_time FROM tickets t JOIN ticket_responses tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id ORDER BY t.created_at DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, t.issue_description, tr.response_text FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id LEFT JOIN ticket_responses tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id;
SELECT a.name AS agent_name, d.name AS department_name, tr.response_text FROM agents a JOIN departments d ON a.department = d.department_id JOIN ticket_responses tr ON a.agent_id = tr.agent_id;

SELECT t.ticket_id, t.issue_description, t.status, a.name AS agent_name, tr.response_text FROM tickets t JOIN agents a ON t.customer_id = a.agent_id LEFT JOIN ticket_responses tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, t.created_at, tr.response_text FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id LEFT JOIN ticket_responses tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id;
SELECT d.name AS department_name, COUNT(a.agent_id) AS total_agents FROM departments d JOIN agents a ON d.manager_id = a.agent_id GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM tickets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tickets.*, customers.name AS customer_name FROM tickets JOIN customers ON tickets.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE tickets.status = 'Resolved';
SELECT agents.department, COUNT(agents.agent_id) AS agent_count FROM agents GROUP BY agents.department;
SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, COUNT(tickets.ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;

SELECT tickets.ticket_id, tickets.issue_description, ticket_responses.response_text AS last_response FROM tickets JOIN ticket_responses ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_responses.ticket_id WHERE ticket_responses.response_time = (SELECT MAX(response_time) FROM ticket_responses WHERE ticket_responses.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id);
SELECT t1.ticket_id AS original_ticket_id, t2.ticket_id AS duplicate_ticket_id FROM tickets t1 JOIN tickets t2 ON t1.issue_description = t2.issue_description AND t1.ticket_id <> t2.ticket_id;
SELECT departments.name, agents.name AS agent_name FROM departments JOIN agents ON departments.manager_id = agents.agent_id;
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('day', resolved_at - created_at)) AS avg_resolution_time FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Resolved';

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, ARRAY_AGG(tickets.issue_description) AS issues_reported FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name ORDER BY COUNT(tickets.ticket_id) DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM ticket_responses GROUP BY ticket_id HAVING COUNT(response_id) > 3;

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, COUNT(ticket_responses.response_id) AS response_count FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_responses ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_responses.ticket_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT agents.name AS agent_name, COUNT(ticket_responses.response_id) AS response_count FROM agents LEFT JOIN ticket_responses ON agents.agent_id = ticket_responses.agent_id GROUP BY agents.name;

SELECT departments.name, SUM(CASE WHEN tickets.status = 'Open' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS open_tickets, SUM(CASE WHEN tickets.status = 'Resolved' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS resolved_tickets FROM departments LEFT JOIN agents ON departments.manager_id = agents.agent_id LEFT JOIN tickets ON agents.agent_id = tickets.customer_id GROUP BY departments.name;

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, AVG(DATE_PART('day', ticket_responses.response_time - tickets.created_at)) AS avg_response_time FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_responses ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_responses.ticket_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT agents.name AS agent_name, COUNT(ticket_responses.response_text) AS response_text_count FROM agents JOIN ticket_responses ON agents.agent_id = ticket_responses.agent_id GROUP BY agents.name;

SELECT departments.name, AVG(CASE WHEN tickets.status = 'Resolved' THEN DATE_PART('day', tickets.resolved_at - tickets.created_at) ELSE DATE_PART('day', NOW() - tickets.created_at) END) AS avg_resolution_time FROM departments LEFT JOIN agents ON departments.manager_id = agents.agent_id LEFT JOIN tickets ON agents.agent_id = tickets.customer_id GROUP BY departments.name;

SELECT DISTINCT customers.name AS customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id) AS unique_tickets_count FROM customers JOIN tickets ON customers.customer_id = tickets.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT tickets.ticket_id) > 1;
SELECT agent_id, MAX(response_time) - MIN(response_time) AS response_time_range FROM ticket_responses GROUP BY agent_id HAVING MAX(response_time) > MIN(response_time);

SELECT agents.name AS agent_name, AVG(DATE_PART('day', ticket_responses.response_time - tickets.created_at)) AS avg_response_time FROM agents JOIN tickets ON agents.agent_id = tickets.customer_id JOIN ticket_responses ON tickets.ticket_id = ticket_responses.ticket_id GROUP BY agents.name;
